title: Palestinians react to Trump's 'Board of Peace' to rebuild Gaza | ABC NEWS
description: Palestinians in Gaza have reacted with scepticism and cautious hope to a new US-led committee announced by President Donald Trump to oversee the region's rebuilding and governance.  The Gaza Board of Peace is mainly composed of American officials, including Trump's son-in-law. The Israeli Prime Minister, Benjamin Netanyahu, has criticised the makeup of this Palestinian governing body. title: Outback NSW lake home to hundreds of turtles set to run dry in 130-year first | ABC NEWS
description: The lives of hundreds of turtles at Imperial Lakes Nature Park are under threat, as its eastern lake is on the verge of drying up for the first time in 130 years.   Hot conditions have left the lake at knee-depth, with the situation set to worsen, and at least 87 megalitres of water are urgently required. Landcare Broken Hill has asked the community to help raise $150,000 to buy water for the lake. title: Emergency services inundated on Sydney's wettest day in decades | ABC NEWS
description: A woman narrowly escaped injury when a landslide struck her home at Great Mackerel Beach on Sydney's Northern Beaches. Heavy overnight rain caused mud and trees to sweep into the back of the house. The State Emergency Service (SES) received over 2,000 calls for assistance over the  weekend. While the weather has improved, residents are urged to remain vigilant. title: Flying butcher brings local beef back to Katherine after 25 years | ABC NEWS
description: A butcher who almost lost his life in a helicopter crash ten years ago has launched a new chapter of local food production in the Northern Territory town of Katherine.  After an incredible recovery, Matt Gane has now realised his vision of producing 100 per cent local beef for his community, overseeing the entire production line, from heli-mustering right down to the plate.  And a warning, this report contains content that may be confronting for viewers. Sam Parry has the story for ABC News Northern Territory.
